newsitem.title: CANADA: CFCF suspends special shareholders meeting.
newsitem.headline: CFCF suspends special shareholders meeting.

text.p: CFCF Inc said on Friday today's special general meeting of shareholders has been suspended but the suspension does not invalidate the acquisition by Groupe Videotron Ltd of CFCF.
Shareholders were to meet today to approve the amalgamation deal under which a subsidiary of Videotron had acquired all multiple voting shares and 99.75 percent of the subordinate voting shares.

CFCF said the decision to suspend the meeting comes further to a decision rendered by the Quebec securities commission in response to a petition made by certain CFCF debentureholders. The QSC will disclose its motives for the decision next week.
CFCF said the suspension does not impact the pending CRTC application.
It said it and Videotron will announce their response to the QSC decision after deliberation.
